description.name: User/Client Sync
description.tagline: Automatic 2 way syncing between client and user details.
description.long:
A module that syncs data between users and clients using hooks and localapi requests.

**Data Synced**

* Email Address
* First Name
- Last Name

**Hooks:**

* ClientEdit - Triggered when a change is made to the clients deteails
* UserEdit - Triggered when a change is made to the users deteails

**Local API Requests:**

* GetClients - Used to search the client ID
* UpdateClient - Sends new data to update the User account using the User ID
* GetUsers - Used to search the user ID
* UpdateUser - Sends new data to update the User account using the User ID

**Workflows:**

* ClientEdit -> GetUsers -> UpdateUser
* UserEdit -> GetClients -> UpdateClient

**Logging**

* Full logging in module log
* Additional admin Success or Error message, including user ID
